biotools.summary: exSTRa is an R package for the detection of repeat expansions with Illumina next-generation sequencing (NGS) data of cases and controls. exSTRa supports both whole-genome and whole-exome sequencing (WGS and WES). Only paired-end data is supported.

bioschemas.name: exSTRa
bioschemas.summary: exSTRa is an R package for the detection of repeat expansions with Illumina next-generation sequencing (NGS) data of cases and controls. exSTRa supports both whole-genome and whole-exome sequencing (WGS and WES). Only paired-end data is supported.
